articles.description: United signed 18-year-old Diallo in October but failed to secure a work permit, so allowed him to remain with the Serie A side while they tried to secure one, with plans to bring him in this month.
articles.content: Manchester United have rejected attempts from Atalanta to keep teenage winger Amad Diallo on loan for the rest of the season, reports claim, as he bids to wrap up his £37million move to Old Trafford.… [+3346 chars]

articles.title: Danny Murphy makes Premier League title prediction after Leicester City's win at Newcastle - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: Match of the Day pundits Murphy and Karen Carney singles out two Foxes players for praise after the 2-1 win at St James' Park which left Brendan Rodgers' side a point behind the top two
articles.content:

articles.author: Max Winters
articles.title: Pep Guardiola branded 'shameful' and 'disgraceful' by furious fans after he backed Benjamin Mendy - Daily Mail
articles.description: Guardiola defended the Frenchman after he became the latest in a growing list of high-profile footballers to be caught breaking Government regulations by celebrating over the festive period.
